name: Slabfield
description:
Celebrating my 27th day on the platform with this #OBJKT4OBJKT drop. Slabfield is an interactive NFT responsive to touch. Nudge the art to change speed, colour and direction and feel how the algorithm responds to you. Works on both smartphones and laptops/desktops with mouse. 

Coded in p5.javascript. Uses WebGL to render 3D objects and lights, so might take a few seconds to load.
